entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-04-19
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • System.Security.Cryptography.Tests CertTests.RaceDisposeAndKeyAccess failing #85073
  • [wasm?] Mono interpreter vector argument alignment issue #85071
  • builder.SetBasePath does not work as expected #85068
  • [API Proposal]: Generic type in Math #85066
  • Assertion failed 'headerFunctionLength <= 0x3FFFFU' during 'Emit GC+EH tables' (IL size 712083; hash 0x46e9aa75; Tier0-MinOpts) #85063
  • Assertion failed 'm_fgBBcount == m_compiler->fgBBcount' in during 'Profile instrumentation' (Instrumented Tier0) #85061
  • [libraries-jitstress-random] Assertion failed 'bad 8 byte op' #85058
  • GeneratedConfigurationBinder type is generated with no content #85057
    8.0.0
  • Test failures not reported in test run #85056
    8.0.0
  • [mono][interpreter] While debugging second call stack level has the wrong il offset #85055
    8.0.0
  • [wasm-mt] Keep track of additional JS keepalive sources for worker threads #85052
  • NativeAOT lldb error "error: need to add support for DW_TAG_base_type 'void' encoded with DW_ATE = 0x0, bit_size = 0" #85051
    8.0.0
  • System.Text.RegularExpressions.Tests segmentation fault #85046
  • [browser] Split dotnet.js and introduce loader + emscripten #85045
    8.0.0
  • Trimming: Reflection access to compiler generated methods produces warnings #85042
  • Assertion failed 'varTypeIsStruct(TypeGet())' during 'Optimize Valnum CSEs' #85037
    8.0.0
  • System.Net.Http.Enterprise.Tests build failing in CI #85035
    8.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: Add read only collection returning members to NumberFormatInfo and DateTimeFormatInfo to avoid allocation of cloning #85034
    Future
  • Methods that take a function pointer can't be reflection invoked #85028
    8.0.0
  • This operation is not supported on .NET Standard as Reflection.Emit is not available #85025
  • [wasm] Clang instruction selection crash for PackedSimd.Shuffle in AOT #85023

Closed

  • Assertion failed 'IsBaselineSimdIsaSupportedDebugOnly()' during 'Lowering nodeinfo' #85059
  • Correctness bug: String.EndsWith may ignore trailing null characters #85064
  • Some DateTimeTest format tests fail on the upcoming Fedora 39 #84763
    8.0.0
  • Coredistools failure to disassemble vextracti64x4 #84967
    8.0.0
  • Cookies lose implicit domain after serialization and adding to container. #80053
    Future
  • Odd, and inconsistent debugger behavior with string interpolation #85053
  • CoreCLR Runtime Tests aren't running on outerloop-only queues #57007
    8.0.0
  • Reduce the trim requirements on MetadataUpdateHandlerAttribute #66069
    8.0.0
  • JsonSerializer.Serialize overloads accepting `JsonSerializerContext` don't support unspeakable types. #84260
    8.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: Add Enumerable.WhereNotNull to System.Linq #85054
  • JSON Serialize as object doesn't work with source generation by default #84704
    8.0.0
  • System.Text.Json Polymorphic Type Resolving Issue #77532
    8.0.0
  • Add source gen support for `unspeakable types` #82457
    8.0.0
  • [wasm] Assertion failure -- condition 'aname != NULL' not met #84859
  • `HttpRequestException`: Destination is too short. (Parameter 'destination') #78516
    8.0.0
  • mono gc hangs on ppc64le .net builds #83879
  • [System.Text.Json] JsonSerializer.Deserialize hangs forever deserializing when Newtonsoft.Json's JsonConvert.DeserializeObject does not #85033
  • Test failure JIT/IL_Conformance/Old/Conformance_Base/bge_un_r4/bge_un_r4.dll #85024
  • Unexpected behavior (InvalidOperationException) with [JsonRequired] property set through constructor #84702
  • Bad CodeAnalysis warning and inaccessible DynamicallyAccessedMembersAttribute to fix it #84990
  • Test failure Loader\\binding\\tracing\\BinderTracingTest.ResolutionFlow\\BinderTracingTest.ResolutionFlow #84913
    8.0.0
  • Test failure JIT\\opt\\Vectorization\\UnrollEqualsStartsWIth\\UnrollEqualsStartsWIth.cmd #84912
    8.0.0
  • [wasm] Blazor/AOT tests failing because `Microsoft.JSInterop.WebAssembly` is not getting skipped for AOT #85010
    8.0.0

PullRequests

Created

  • Add TimeProvider.GetElapsedTime(long) overload #85078
    new-api-needs-documentation, area-System.DateTime, 8.0.0
  • [JIT] ARM64 Fix - Added 'gtSwapRelop' to take into account the unordered nan flag #85076
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [PERF] Remove missed iOSMobileNet6 runtimeType check #85075
    area-Infrastructure
  • [PERF] Remove pipeline dependencies and steps for running Maui Mobile #85074
    area-Infrastructure
  • [release/7.0] Port perfmap environment variable change to 7.0 #85072
    Servicing-consider, area-Tracing-coreclr, 7.0.x
  • Simplify `impSIMDPopStack` #85070
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Use emit-based invoke for all of WASM including DI #85065
    arch-wasm, area-System.Reflection, tenet-performance, os-android, 8.0.0
  • [release/6.0-staging][wasm][debugger] Remove error message when browser is closed #85062
    area-Debugger-mono
  • [mono][debugger] Improving debugger functionaties #85050
    area-Debugger-mono
  • [wasi] implement ICU bundling #85049
    area-Build-mono, os-wasi, 8.0.0
  • Add NativeAOT runtime pack build for iOS/tvOS/Catalyst #85047
    area-Infrastructure-installer
  • [wasm] Add PackedSimd saturating integer arith. #85043
    area-System.Runtime.Intrinsics, new-api-needs-documentation
  • [browser] bump System.Text.Json timeout #85041
    arch-wasm, area-System.Text.Json, 8.0.0
  • Add GCStress striping to jit64_do #85040
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [LoongArch64] amend the crossgen2/r2rdump for LA64. #85038
    area-crossgen2-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Jettison vxsort support in the GC when optimizing for size #85036
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [Arm64] Replace pairs of `str` with `stp` #85032
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Implement function pointer type support #85031
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [JIT] (experiment) ARM64 - Hoist DivByZero and Overflow check out of loops #85027
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [wasi] Fix support for paths with spaces #85022
    arch-wasm, test-enhancement, area-Build-mono, os-wasi

Merged

  • Avoid allocations when adding existing items to the blob heap. #81059
    area-System.Reflection.Metadata, community-contribution
  • Disallow `BLK<SIMD>` #84868
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Improve DateTime{Offset} formatting further in a variety of cases #84963
    needs-area-label
  • Ensure vextractf64x4 and vextracti64x4 aren't marked DstDstSrc #85030
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Remove more unnecessary scenarios from HWIntrinsic test templates and fix timeout/failure #85026
    area-System.Runtime.Intrinsics
  • Delete `GT_STORE_OBJ` #84951
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Address a couple `TODO-ADDR`s #84906
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Private API for RefreshMemoryLimit #83707
    area-GC-coreclr
  • Fix typo in debugging-runtime.md #85060
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Remove unused helix queue definitions #85018
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • Reduce the trim requirements on MetadataUpdateHandlerAttribute #84369
    area-System.Reflection, new-api-needs-documentation, linkable-framework, community-contribution, 8.0.0
  • Fix a number of issues related to boxed value serialization #84768
    area-System.Text.Json, 8.0.0
  • Revert "[mono][aot] Enable deduplication of runtime invoke wrappers" #85048
    area-Codegen-AOT-mono, 8.0.0
  • Fix src/tests/build.cmd -alltargets on Windows #85039
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • [workloads] Bump .NET 7 Package Version #84956
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • [mono][jit] Improve mono_print_ins (). #85011
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono
  • Fix HTTP3 header decoder buffer allocation #78862
    area-System.Net.Http, community-contribution, 8.0.0
  • [mono][sgen] Fix GetTotalMemory #84480
    area-GC-mono
  • Fix illumos-x64 build #85006
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [browser] JSObject thread affinity assertions #84981
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, 8.0.0
  • [browser] Make JSExport worker thread friendlier #83680
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, 8.0.0
  • Add binary parsing support to integer types #84998
    new-api-needs-documentation, needs-area-label
  • Fix unrollings on AVX1-only machines #84946
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [browser] fix trimming of `LegacyExports` with `WasmEnableLegacyJsInterop` #83664
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, 8.0.0
  • [mono][wasm] Avoid stripping the runtimes built by the make targets i… #85021
    area-Build-mono
  • Updating XML doc comments for hardware intrinsics to include VEX and EVEX forms #84892
    area-System.Runtime.Intrinsics, arch-avx512
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0' => 'release/6.0-staging' #84610
    Servicing-approved, area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0' => 'release/7.0-staging' #84611
    Servicing-approved, area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Increase the opcode value for opcodes where the jiterpreter is able to unroll sets and moves #85007
    arch-wasm, area-Codegen-Jiterpreter-mono
  • Reduce the number of hwintrinsic tests by removing no longer interesting scenarios #85008
    area-System.Runtime.Intrinsics

Updated

  • Report -1 for GC.GetGeneration(nongc_obj) and same for GetObjectGeneration #85017
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • [JIT] ARM64 - Combine 'neg' and 'cmp' to 'cmn' #84667
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Fix some issues with null check handling #84523
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Lowering Vector512() methods : comparison + shift #84942
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, arch-avx512
  • Simplify some importer code #84656
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Use cinv instead of csel when possible #84926
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Use `gtNewIndir` everywhere #84528
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [browser] Enable webcil in Wasm SDK #84977
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, 8.0.0
  • Enable EVEX feature: embedded broadcast for Vector256.Add() in limited cases #84821
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-avx512
  • Various fixes for consecutive registers found with jitstressregs #84824
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [NativeAOT] Simplifying access to thread static variables #84566
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Try to untangle the rid calculation. #82832
    community-contribution
  • Almost complete sync of logic for generating DAM/RUC reflection access warnings between ILLink and NativeAOT #84770
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • The ConstructorBuilder and MethodBuilder generated parameter should not has default value by default #84550
    area-System.Reflection.Emit, community-contribution
  • [wasm-mt] Support async JS interop on threadpool threads #84494
    arch-wasm, area-Threading-mono
  • [mono] add internal WebWorkerEventLoop utility class #84492
    arch-wasm, area-Threading-mono
  • let user know working directory will be used as content root path by default #82445
    area-Extensions-Hosting, community-contribution
  • [mono][metadata] Fix lookup of matching interface method with covariant returns #84160
    area-VM-meta-mono
  • Fix enterprise linux build #84795
    area-System.Net.Security
  • [mono][jit] Adding Vector128.GetElement as intrinsic in arm64. #84929
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono
  • Assign correct slots for open generic service descriptors during IEnumerable resolution #80410
    area-Extensions-DependencyInjection, community-contribution
  • Enable ComWrappers for NativeAOT on non-Windows #85000
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Add a dedicated Ascii.IsValid path #84881
    area-System.Buffers, 8.0.0
  • Acclerate `Vector512` multiply and divide. #84941
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, arch-avx512
  • Attempt to fix #84636 #84871
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [Mono] Use dn_vector_t instead of GArray in a few places #84027
    area-VM-meta-mono
  • [wasm-mt] A version of LowLevelLifoSemaphore that uses callbacks on the browser #84491
    arch-wasm, area-VM-threading-mono
  • [mono][tasks] Extract EmitWasmBundle into generic EmitBundle task and enable bundling in mono self-contained library #84191
    area-Infrastructure-mono
  • NoGCRegion Callback #82045
    area-GC-coreclr, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Enable event pipe test in NativeAOT CI run #84891
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Populating JSON properties support #83669
    area-System.Text.Json, new-api-needs-documentation
  • [test] Try to use nodejs instead of v8 #83524
    NO-MERGE, area-Infrastructure-mono
  • add nixos ping executable path #84997
    area-System.Net, community-contribution
  • [mono][llvm] Enable the cold calling conv on osx/linux. #83519
    area-Codegen-LLVM-mono
  • Avoid null ref in JsonSeparatorNamingPolicy #85002
    area-System.Text.Json, 8.0.0
  • Change `callvirt` into `calli` for virtual delegates #83461
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono
  • [LoongArch64] revert the modification about the LA64's PageSize by #83632. #84960
    area-VM-coreclr
  • Don't re-instrument methods which don't need that #84772
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Expose setting CPU SamplingProfiler rate #83635
    area-Tracing-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Enable CS1591 for projects that don't use intellisense package XML file #84917
    bug, area-Infrastructure-libraries, blocking-release, 8.0.0
  • Add TargetHostName to QuicConnection #84976
    new-api-needs-documentation, area-System.Net.Quic

entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-04-19
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • dotnet --info hitting /lib64/libstdc++.so.6: version `GLIBCXX_3.4.20' not found on Latest net8.0 #31893
  • [8.0 preview 3] NuGet package validation fails when UseArtifactsOutput=true #31882

Closed

  • Provide a way for `dotnet sln add` to Pipe Input #11558
  • dotnet CLI fails to fetch v3.1.3 packages with nuget on Kubuntu 20.04 #11576
  • .net core runtime 3.1 not work when centos reboot!!!!! #11262
  • Update link provided in build error due to missing ref packs to specific troubleshooting page #11243
  • Could not load type 'System.IO.Compression.ZipFile' from assembly on docker raspberry pi when publish with Trimmed #11096
  • SDK 3.1.20x: MSBuild problem with external classes accessed via reflection #11043
  • dotnet publish - way to remove pdb and other files #16975
  • Mixing WPF project and ASP.Net Core Class Library causes build errors #21942
  • GenAPI incorrectly generates collection-based interface implementation #31570
  • Add solution folder argument to dotnet-sln show-folders (show solution folders) #10308
    Backlog

PullRequests

Created

  • updated containers docs #31884
    Area-Containers
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0.4xx' => 'main' #31883
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

Merged

  • Fix `dotnet list package` when current directory contains a `#` character in Unix systems #20449
    Area-NuGet
  • [release/7.0.4xx] containers: removed stack trace from logged error message #31639
    Area-Containers
  • Allow `dotnet sln list` to display solution folder paths #18502
    Area-CLI
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0.4xx' => 'main' #31844
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Fix dotnet/sdk-container-builds#414 by using three-digit version #31852
    Area-Containers
  • Disambiguate GenAPI calls to base constructors #31860
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [wasm] Fix regression in blazor+aot #31870
    untriaged, Area-AspNetCore

Updated

  • Add a PostAction to support modifying Json files in CLI templates #29880
    Area-dotnet new
  • Copied some out of sync loc files into main #31871
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Fix incorrect sln add generation #11846
  • Blazor hosted #30908
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Signing: enable NuGet signature verification by default on Linux #31868
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Bump Verify.Xunit from 19.12.1 to 19.12.3 in /eng/dependabot #31828
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, dependencies, dependabot: 7.0.3xx
  • Wasm SDK packed as a nuget package #31519
    Area-Infrastructure
  • [release/7.0.4xx] include container tasks and targets directly to `Microsoft.NET.Publish.Sdk` #31432
    Area-Containers
  • Add `-aot` parameter to the console template #31739
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

entry.title: dotnet/csharplang - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-04-19
entry.content:
Issues

Updated

  • Champion: Switch expression as a statement expression #2632
    Working Set
  • Champion "readonly for locals and parameters" #188
    Backlog
  • [Proposal]: Lock statement pattern #7104

PullRequests

Merged

  • inline-arrays.md: correct typos #7128

entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-04-19
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Nullable state not properly set on variables in pattern on erroneous call #67880
    Backlog
  • Possibility of improving error recovery for switch expressions with unclosed pattern's `}` or `]` #67876
  • Code folding in Razor markup does not fold #region #67874
  • "Move to namespace" refactoring changes top level namespace instead of modifying specific object (multiple definitions in single file) #67872

Closed

  • Folded Ref Structs with Fixed Buffer causes System.AccessViolationException. #67799
    17.7
  • `TrackedSteps` and `TrackedOutputSteps` have same doc comment #67733
    17.7

PullRequests

Created

  • Update code lens cache to use the syntax version #67884
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Move tests down from editor features to features layer. #67883
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Implement ISymbol.LocationList #67881
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Seal WrappedParameterSymbol.HasUnscopedRefAttribute #67879
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Update ICSharpCode.Decompiler to 7.2.1.6856 #67875
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Also check project path when add new document in LSP #67871
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Merge release/dev16.11-vs-deps to release/dev17.0-vs-deps #67870
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge

Merged

  • Remove unnecessary references from unit testing libraries #67882
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Flatten code actions when client doesn't have VS capability #67868
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Pull C# and VB Analyzers tests out of 'EditorFeatures' test projects into their own projects. #67877
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Fix lsp classification mappings #67865
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Simplify code in IncrementalMemberEditAnalyzer for computing updated … #67873
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Clarify documentation of `TrackedOutputSteps` #67835
    Area-Compilers, Documentation, New Feature - Source Generators, Next

Updated

  • Implement element access for inline array types #67830
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Feature - Inline Arrays
  • Initial pass at enabling prebuilt detection #67645
    Area-Infrastructure, Community, untriaged
  • Interceptors: handle duplicates, additional signature validation, etc. #67786
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Merge ITextAndVersion and ITextVersionable #67847
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Pool intermediary dictionaries use to create named type and namespace members #67727
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Improve detection of receiver cloning in ref safety analysis #67736
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Language Feature - Ref Fields
  • Better recover from missing closing `}` or `]` in switch statements #67862
    Area-Compilers, Community, untriaged
  • Do not return file-local type requested by unmangled metadata name #67183
    Area-Compilers, Community
  • Reuse member names collection in decl tree across edits #67753
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Pool node collections in analyzer driver. #67776
    Area-Analyzers, untriaged
  • Add `IsExplicitExtension` #67850
    Area-Compilers, C# 12.0
  • Include diagnostic help URL in output #67836
    Area-Compilers, 17.7

entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-04-19
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Blazor 8.0 per-user state management #47796
  • NPM package @microsoft/dotnet-js-interop needs a README file #47789
  • Perf regression: ApiCrudAddProduct, ApiCrudDeleteProduct, ApiCrudListProducts #47788
  • Perf regression: ApiCrudDeleteProduct, ApiCrudGetProductDetails, ApiCrudUpdateProduct #47787
  • Perf regression: https #47786
  • Perf improvement: plainTextSansFilter #47785
  • InstallVisualStudio.ps1 exits with 0 when another VS Installer is running #47783
  • Generate form field identifiers for Blazor server-side rendering #47780
  • API http.sys: EnableKernelResponseBuffering #47777
  • The antiforgery token could not be decrypted: The payload was invalid #47774
  • Redis as db #47773
  • Review use of null suppression operator in RDG #47771
    8.0-preview5

Closed

  • `HttpProtocol.ConnectProtocol` is not being reset between unrelated requests #47647
  • Hot Reload nearly always fails, with Blazor WebAssembly and "dotnet watch" #45519
    7.0.x
  • Perf regression: plainTextEmptyFilter, single_query #47769
  • Perf improvement: mapaction #47772
  • SignalR client side taking too long to connect, Using Latest Angular .Net Template on Visual Studio #47732
  • Add AOT flag to worker template #46541
    8.0-preview4
  • Unable to restore on Windows #47781
  • Unable to add Token Providers when using multiple Identity Types #47779
  • Add exception property to the problem details context #47651
  • When quickly switching between tabs, the tab experiences a delay in component disposal. #47713
  • Consume wasm targets and metadata from the .NET Wasm SDK #47001
    8.0-preview4
  • Utilize new StaticWebAssets SDK #47242
    8.0-preview4
  • How do I get the Vite dev server to work with the Azure AD authentication? #47763

PullRequests

Created

  • Fix nullref when getting struct from feature collection and it isn't present #47795
    area-runtime
  • Fix RequestBody logging when zero byte read is used #47794
    area-runtime, feature-middleware
  • Sync shared code from runtime #47793
    area-runtime
  • Update MessagePack version #47790
    area-signalr
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 1159: Build ID 2162433 #47784
    area-mvc
  • http.sys; add opt-in support for kernel-mode response buffering #47776
    area-runtime, servers-httpsys, area-perf
  • Fix null property name handling logic in SystemTextJsonValidationMetadataProvider #47775
    area-mvc, area-web-frameworks

Merged

  • Reset ConnectProtocol during reset #47660
    area-runtime, 8.0-preview4
  • Add exception to problem details context #47760
    area-runtime, blog-candidate, 8.0-preview4
  • Replace ISystemClock with TimeProvider in OutputCaching, ResponseCaching #47753
    area-runtime, 8.0-preview4
  • small dev doc tweaks #47782
    area-infrastructure, 8.0-preview4
  • Add support for binding from form body to RDG #47768
    area-web-frameworks, 8.0-preview4
  • Remove ASP.NET's JSON feature switch #47770
    area-mvc, 8.0-preview4
  • Add AOT flag to worker template #47721
    area-mvc, 8.0-preview4

Updated

  • RDG metadata generation based on endpoint response type. #47741
    area-runtime
  • Blazor form model expression formatting #47754
    area-blazor
  • [Blazor] Adds support for server side rendered forms (without a body) #47716
    area-blazor
  • [SignalR] Seamless Reconnect #47748
    area-signalr
  • Make HttpLogging middleware endpoint aware #47595
    area-runtime, feature-middleware
  • [blazor] Boot handled by dotnet.js #47752
    area-blazor, blazor-wasm, 8.0-preview4
  • Update the Worker template to use `Host.CreateApplicationBuilder` #47720
    area-mvc
  • Enable AOT template tests #47247
    area-mvc, area-web-frameworks, 8.0-preview4
  • Unified app model routing #47759
    area-blazor
  • Update SDK #47540
    area-infrastructure, area-signalr

entry.title: dotnet/diagnostics - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-04-19
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • `dumpgen gen0` makes analyze exit with an exit code of 139 on Linux #3842
  • dump class and obj unable to display fields #3841

Closed

  • Byte-Order-Mark in the the middle of file generated by `traverseheap -xml` #3843

PullRequests

Merged

  • Remove BOM marker from the middle of !traversexml #3844
    bug, auto-merge, sos

Updated

  • Reimplement !dso and !fq in C# #3837
    DO NOT MERGE

entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-04-19
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Appsettings.json System.IO.FileNotFoundException #14679
  • Style values are being applied too early #14678
  • A plea for help #14677
  • Content page styles are not loaded on first page navigation on iOS #14676
  • .NET Maui AppLink OnAppLinkRequestReceived doesn't fire on iOS #14671
  • [net7.0][iOS] TitleView contents appear partially above the top of the screen #14670
  • [net7.0 / net8.0] [iOS] Memory leak when CollectionView.ItemsSource changes #14664
  • Entitlements.plist is not used correctly in Debug configuration #14662
  • Basic Binding Label is not working #14657
  • [net7.0 / net8.0] [iOS] Memory leak when navigating to a page with a CollectionView with images #14654
  • [Bug]: Android release crash, debug work as normal #14653
  • Different styling between iOS and Android in Flyout menu #14651
  • Various issues with CarouselView and Resources #14649

Closed

  • [Bug] [Windows] Narrator randomly announces "Desktop child side bridge pane" before various controls #3284
    .NET 8 Planning
  • MAUI Mac Catalyst app crashes on Intel based MacBooks #14658
  • ListView/CollectionView memory leak under Windows #9162
    .NET 8 Planning
  • [regression/7.0.81] Grid layouts are not working as they did in 7.0.59 (Windows) #14537
    .NET 7 + Servicing
  • Why is it that the .NET MAUI WebView is unable to open links to websites that are not its source? #14414
  • [Android] Navigating event not fired from WebView for data:video links with download attribute presented #14636
    Backlog
  • [Bug] Look at marking header/footer rows on Android CollectionView as ImportantForAccessibility=false #2674
    Backlog
  • [Bug] When a new page is loaded during navigation nothing has accessibility focus #2759
    .NET 8 Planning
  • Excessive space on the right side of a checkbox #4693
    .NET 8 Planning
  • [Android] TableView doesn't respond to click after first use/navigation #4809
    Backlog
  • [Bug] Ensure that fonts / layouts update in real time as you update the accessibility fonts on devices #1824
    .NET 8 Planning
  • [Android] [ScenarioDay] The default size of SearchBar is wrong, it does not fill the space #7137
    Backlog
  • How to implement the bidirectional list/scroll view in Maui #14652
  • [Bug] [Android] StackLayout receives accessibility focus on Android API 21-22 #1089
    .NET 8 Planning
  • [Bug] Not having WebView2 Runtime installed create unhelpful error #1579
    Backlog
  • [Bug] BlazorWebView with WindowsForms: keyboard and focus issues #2341
    .NET 8 Planning
  • net6.0-android generated sources compile error(don't support covariant for return value ) #3867
    Backlog

PullRequests

Created

  • [Windows] Allow to customize the Shell FlyoutIcon #14663
    t/bug, platform/windows 🪟, area/shell 🐢

Merged

  • [net7.0.2xx-sr5] Treat */Auto spans as resolvable finite measures rather than infinite #14667
    area/layout 🔲
  • [xamlc] enable for $(Configuration) names like ReleaseProd #14638
    area/Xaml </>
  • [controls] fix performance issue in {AppThemeBinding} #14625
    area/perf 🏎️, area/collectionview 📃, area/controls 🎮, backport/suggested
  • [Housekeeping] Removed fixed page background color in the Gallery #14639
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/infrastructure 🏗️
  • Bump BenchmarkDotNet from 0.13.3 to 0.13.5.2136 #14659
    area/upstream, dependencies, nuget
  • Bump cake.tool from 1.2.0 to 2.1.0 #14660
    area/upstream, dependencies, nuget
  • Bump powershell from 7.2.1 to 7.3.4 #14661
    area/upstream, dependencies, nuget
  • [net7.0] Fix InputTransparent for layouts #14668
    area/layout 🔲
  • [release/7.0.2xx-sr5] Fix InputTransparent for layouts #14669
    area/layout 🔲
  • [net7.0] Treat */Auto spans as resolvable finite measures rather than infinite #14665
    area/layout 🔲
  • Fix InputTransparent for layouts #14650
    area/layout 🔲, backport/suggested, backport/approved
  • Treat */Auto spans as resolvable finite measures rather than infinite #14648
    area/layout 🔲, layout-grid, backport/suggested, backport/approved
  • Allow SearchBar to take full width on Android #13716
    platform/android 🤖, area/controls 🎮, control-entry, backport/suggested

Updated

  • Build Debug and Release device tests #14392
    area/infrastructure 🏗️
  • [net7.0] Make MAUI into a workload based on NuGet packs #14331
    area/setup 🪄
  • Style specificity #13818
    area/Xaml </>
  • Support both Update and Include for maui #14576
    area/setup 🪄
  • Try a new Microsoft.NET.Sdk.Maui SDK #14640
  • [iOS] Clear BindingContext when cell is queued for reuse #14619

entry.title: dotnet/efcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-04-19
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Primitive collections #30731
    Backlog
  • Metadata and type mapping support for primitive collections #30730
  • Allow mapping arbitrary IEnumerables to arrays #30729
    8.0.0

Closed

  • Update Disconnected Entities #30714
  • AppDbContext(DbContextOption) Microsoft Visual Studio Installing 'Microsoft.EntityFrameworkCore' failed. #30698
  • SqlServerCompact EFCore Model Generation #30675
  • Add migration doesn't work and doesn't show error message "add-migration : Value does not fall within the expected range." #30674
  • Entity Framework Core: Create the database #30673
  • Visual studio 2019 Professional 16.11.25 #30672
  • Enum value entity framework considers the default value is 0 #30661
  • Making Query Filter Extension Method failed #30655
  • Context.Database.SqlQuery not working in EF core 6 #30650
  • Allow Value Population on Inherited Type Tables in TPT #30647
  • How to query to retrieve all records and also see if the records exists in many-to-many mapping table #30646
  • Reading is extremely slow if there's a value with a large amount of text #30644
  • How to use EF core sqlite with OneDrive? #30642
  • EF Core DbContext caching resulted included entities with dynamic Global filter #30641
  • Why does EF Core try to create objects that are not present in the class? #30636
  • The value of '<key>' is unknown - property is part of a foreign key for which the principal entity in the relationship is not known #30623
  • JSON column update not tracked as "Modified" in ChangeTracker state #30596
  • Join with local collection using TVP? #19016
  • Join with client side collections #12431
  • NativeAOT/trimming compatibility for Microsoft.Data.Sqlite #29725
    8.0.0-preview4

PullRequests

Merged

  • Fix trimming warnings in Microsoft.Data.Sqlite #30728

entry.title: dotnet/installer - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-04-19
entry.content:
Issues

Closed

  • vs_buildtools.exe. The application cannot find one of its required files, possibly because it was unable to create it in the folder. Please make sure that the folder in which this application was downloaded is accessible and not read-only. #16131

PullRequests

Created

  • Test vstest patch #16162
  • Use full version for source-build artifacts #16161
  • Add KnownWebAssemblySdkPack to GenerateBundledVersions for .NET 6 and 7 #16159

Merged

  • Update version of SB prebuilts tarball #16155
  • Enable PVP flow for templating repo #16149
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0.4xx' => 'main' #16146

Updated

  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 1224: Build ID 2162430 #16135
